Control Name: Detects Unknown or Unauthorized Components—Procedures are in place to detect the introduction of unknown or unauthorized components.

control_attributes.Control: Detects Unknown or Unauthorized Components—Procedures are in place to detect the introduction of unknown or unauthorized components.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.1 To meet its objectives, the entity uses detection and monitoring procedures to identify (1) changes to configurations that result in the introduction of new vulnerabilities, and (2) susceptibilities to newly discovered vulnerabilities.
